塟字的基本解释

塟
zàng
古同“葬”，掩埋死人，泛指处理死者遗体。

塟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zàng］
［《廣韻》則浪切，去宕，精。］
亦作“塟1”。
(1)掩埋尸体。
(2)泛指依照风俗习惯用其他方法处理尸体。

塟字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　塟； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页236第10
【正字通】俗葬字。

暂无。

塟
Basic explanation of words
塟
zàng
Gu Tong "burial", burying the dead, generally refers to the disposal of the deceased's remains.
塟
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zàng］
["Guangyun" cuts waves, goes down, and refines. ]
Also known as "塟1".
(1) Burying the dead body.
(2) Generally refers to the disposal of corpses by other methods in accordance with customs and habits.
